__e: Right? If he knew someone was following him, he'd be frightened away.
Then, one night, we paid him a visit. It was unofficial.
Couldn't you have told me you were watching him?
And I tailed you home to your new lodgings in Belsize Park.
So I follow you here, and I see you in a window with a woman.
Your brother made certain that anybody who was tailing me is long gone.
And like I said, he had someone on me and, uh... well, if I didn't get lucky, there would be pictures on the front page of today's Post.
I should have listened to you about the man across the street, the guy you said was watching me.
